title: (x) LuxuRush - (similar to) ITC Edwardian Script {Tim D}
content:
Do anybody know which type they used in the  
attached flyer? I guess it's a custom font.

If so do you have any tips towards fonts  
that have a similar feel to them.

Would be great, thank you in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [luxurush.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164136/http:/typophile.com/files/luxurush.jpg) | 97.12 KB |
author: Chris82

comments.content:
[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-edwardian-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-edwardian-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-edwardian-script/")

It has been customised but I think this is the origins.  
Tim

Thank you, really looks like it idd.

[www.futuredesign.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164136/http:/www.futuredesign.nl/ "www.futuredesign.nl")
